typeparam.name: T1
typeparam.span: 此元组的第一个组件的类型。

span.span: The type of the tuple's first component.

typeparam.name: T2
typeparam.span: 此元组的第二个组件的类型。

summary.span: 表示 3 元组，或三元组。

span.span: Represents a 3-tuple, or triple.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定数量和值序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 类表示3元组，即三元组，它是具有三个组件的元组。The class represents a 3-tuple, or triple, which is a tuple that has three components. 可以通过调用 构造函数或静态 方法来实例化 的对象。You can instantiate a object by calling either the constructor or the static method. 您可以使用只读 、和 实例属性检索元组组件的值。You can retrieve the values of the tuple's components by using the read-only , , and instance properties. 元组通常以四种不同的方式使用：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 表示单个数据集。To represent a single set of data. 例如，元组可以表示数据库记录，并且其组件可以表示记录的各个字段。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 提供对数据集的轻松访问和操作。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下面的示例定义了一个 对象的数组，这些对象包含学生姓名、平均测试分数以及所进行的测试数。The following example defines an array of objects that contain the names of students, their average test scores, and the number of tests taken. 数组将传递给 `ComputeStatistics` 方法，该方法计算测试分数的平均值和标准偏差。The array is passed to the `ComputeStatistics` method, which calculates the mean and standard deviation of the test scores. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 从方法返回多个值，而不使用 `out` 参数（在中C#）或 `ByRef` 参数（在 Visual Basic 中）。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如，上一个示例返回 对象中其汇总测试分数统计信息。For example, the previous example returns its summary test score statistics in a object. - 若要通过单个参数向方法传递多个值，则为。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如， 方法只有一个参数，该参数使你可以为启动时线程执行的方法提供一个值。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果提供 对象作为方法参数，则可以为线程的启动例程提供三个数据项。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread's startup routine with three items of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以使用静态 方法来实例化3元组对象，而无需显式指定其组件的类型。You can also use the static method to instantiate a 3-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下面的示例使用 方法来实例化其组件类型为 、和 的3元组。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 3-tuple whose components are of type , , and . returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列条件下，`obj` 参数被视为等于当前实例：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是一个 对象。It is a object. - 它的三个组件的类型与当前实例相同。Its three components are of the same types as the current instance. - 它的三个组件等于当前实例的组件。Its three components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认对象相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下面的示例调用 方法，以确定 对象的数组中是否有任何对象相等。The following example calls the method to determine whether any of the objects in an array of objects are equal to one another. 输出反映 方法在比较其组件具有相等值的 对象时 `true` 返回的事实。The output reflects the fact that the method returns `true` when comparing objects whose components have equal values. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过以下两种方式之一动态确定 组件的类型：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过对 属性返回的值调用 `GetType` 方法。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索表示 对象的 对象，并检索由其 方法返回的数组中的第一个元素。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个 对象的数组，这些对象包含学生姓名、平均测试分数以及所进行的测试数。The following example defines an array of objects that contain the names of students, their average test scores, and the number of tests taken. 数组将传递给 `ComputeStatistics` 方法，该方法计算平均分数、标准偏差和计算统计信息的事例数。The array is passed to the `ComputeStatistics` method, which calculates the mean score, standard deviation, and number of cases from which the statistics are calculated. 这些值存储在由 `ComputeStatistics` 方法返回的 对象中。These values are stored in the object that is returned by the `ComputeStatistics` method. 属性包含事例数。The property contains the number of cases. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/vb/example1.vb#1)]

[!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.class/vb/example1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo

abstract member System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo : obj * System.Collections.IComparer -> int override this.System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo : obj * System.Collections.IComparer -> int

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供用于比较的自定义规则的对象。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比较器将当前的 对象与指定对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置是在指定对象之前、之后还是与其相同。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer, and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.
Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance precedes .
Zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。

span.span: This instance and have the same position in the sort order.
A positive integer
This instance follows .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 尽管可以直接调用此方法，但它最常由包含 参数的集合排序方法调用，以对集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，它由 方法和使用 构造函数实例化的 对象的 方法调用。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等，则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用 方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建 对象的数组，这些对象包含学生姓名、平均测试分数和测试数。The following example creates an array of objects that consist of a student's name, mean test score, and number of tests. 它以未排序的顺序显示数组中每个元组的组件，对数组进行排序，然后调用 以按排序顺序显示每个元组的值。It displays the component of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display the value of each tuple in sorted order. 若要对数组进行排序，此示例定义了一个泛型 `ScoreComparer` 类，该类实现 接口，并按其第二个组件的值（而不是第一个组件）以升序对 对象进行排序。To sort the array, the example defines a generic `ScoreComparer` class that implements the interface and sorts the objects in ascending order by the value of their second component rather than their first component. 请注意，该示例不会直接调用 方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 此方法由数组中每个元素的 方法隐式调用。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: is not a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.Equals(object other, class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer comparer) cil managed
Function Equals (other As Object, comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Boolean Implements IStructuralEquatable.Equals

abstract member System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.Equals : obj * System.Collections.IEqualityComparer -> bool override this.System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.Equals : obj * System.Collections.IEqualityComparer -> bool

param.name: other
param.span: 要与此实例比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个对象，该对象定义用于评估两个对象是否相等的方法。

span.span: An object that defines the method to use to evaluate whether the two objects are equal.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值根据指定的比较方法指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object based on a specified comparison method.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 仅当 `other` 不是 `null`，并且它可以成功地强制转换（在中C#）或转换（在 Visual Basic 中）到 对象（其组件与当前实例具有相同的类型）时，才会调用 实现。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法首先传递要与 实现进行比较的 对象的 值。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回 `true`，则再次调用方法并传递两个 对象的 值。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 如果此方法调用再次返回 `true`，则将第三次调用方法并传递两个 对象的 值。If this method call returns `true` again, the method is called a third time and passed the values of the two objects. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个 `Item2Comparer` 类，该类实现 接口，并更改了 对象的计算是否相等的方式。The following example defines an `Item2Comparer` class that implements the interface and changes the way in which objects are evaluated for equality. 当向传递两个 对象的 属性值时，此方法始终返回 `true`，并调用 方法来计算其 属性值。The method always returns `true` when it is passed the property values of two objects, and it calls the method to evaluate their property values. 如果此方法调用返回 `true`，则其 属性值将传递给方法，该方法始终返回 `true`。If this method call returns `true`, their property values are passed to the method, which always returns `true`. 因此，方法仅根据 属性的值测试相等性。As a result, the method tests for equality based only on the value of the property. 输出说明了一组 对象的数据集的结果，这些对象记录了类中学生的名称、平均测试分数和测试次数。The output illustrates the result for a data set of objects that record the names, mean test score, and number of tests of students in a class. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`3.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.equals/cs/equals2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`3.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`3.equals/vb/equals2.vb#2)]

Function GetHashCode (comparer As IEqualityComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode

abstract member System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode : System.Collections.IEqualityComparer -> int override this.System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable.GetHashCode : System.Collections.IEqualityComparer -> int

param.name: comparer
param.span: 一个对象，其 方法计算当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: An object whose method calculates the hash code of the current object.

summary.span: 使用指定的计算方法计算当前 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: Calculates the hash code for the current object by using a specified computation method.

returns.span: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只是包装对 `comparer` 对象的 实现的调用。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应为被视为相等的两个 对象返回相同的哈希代码。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

summary.span: 比较当前 对象与指定对象，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置：是在指定对象之前、之后还是在与指定对象相同的位置。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

Description
A negative integer

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供了 类的 实现。This method provides the implementation for the class. 尽管可以直接调用方法，但它通常由集合排序方法（如 和 ）的默认重载调用，以对集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等，则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用 方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 方法使用默认的对象比较器来比较每个组件。The method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 对象的数组，这些对象的组件包含学生姓名、平均测试分数和测试数。The following example creates an array of objects whose components consist of a student's name, mean test score, and number of tests. 它以未排序的顺序显示数组中每个元组的组件，对数组进行排序，然后调用 按排序顺序显示每个元组。It displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls to display each tuple in sorted order. 输出显示数组已按其第一个组件排序。The output shows that the array has been sorted by its first component. 请注意，该示例不会直接调用 方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 此方法由数组中每个元素的 方法隐式调用。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的字符串采用格式（*Item1*、 *Item2*、 *Item3*），其中*Item1*、 *Item2*和*Item3*分别表示 、和 属性的值。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, *Item3*), where *Item1*, *Item2*, and *Item3* represent the values of the , , and properties, respectively. 如果 `null`任何属性值，则将其表示为 。If any of the property values is `null`, it is represented as . ## Examples 下面的示例演示 方法。The following example illustrates the method.
